verbose_text: Although it has been reported that integrating 12 copies of the MPH expression cassette into the P. pastoris system can significantly improve the secretion of MPH XREF_BIBR and that MPH can be expressed and secreted by Bacillus subtilis WB800 XREF_BIBR, secretion levels with these two methods are still close to 100-fold lower than the levels of OPHC2 secreted by P. pastoris.
